column4: I have a question: how can I add a custom folder to the Applications menu? (even though this is certainly GNOME-specific)
nautilus-->applications: create directory. it should work.
thanks, the hint is working. And aprospos Nautilus, is there a way to customize the "Go to" menu, for that I don't have to type "applications:///" by hand everytime?
in the worst case, you can make a shortcut in the desktop.
